price: 16. On the Day when We shall seize you with the greatest seizure (punishment). Verily, We will exact retribution.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
